Articles.Content:
Good day fellow space adventurers,

I have recently picked up this lemmings in space from steam, and am enjoying it a lot.

I started trying out mods three days ago, and I have to say that some really pushed me toward greater goals that just orbiting and landing on Kerbal's moons, notably MechJeb that made me really consider building a space station. Rendez-vous and docking manually are something that take far too much time and effort from me to make me consider building 10+ launches for a station.

Sadly, the reason for my coming today on these forums is that I have a nasty problem that seems to be mod related, but that I can't uite figure out, so I posted it in the mod section, hopefully at the right place. It has to be read by a moderators first apparently, so it might not be up for reading yet though.

Anyway, hello to all of you, and hopefully I will visit regularly and see you all around.
